titles.title: HP54 O God, thy being who can sound

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O God, thy being who can sound?
Thee to perfection who can know?
O height immense! No words are found
Thy countless attributes to show.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Unfathomable depths thou art!
O plunge me in thy mercy's sea;
Void of true wisdom is my heart:
With love embrace and cover me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Eternity thy fountain was,
Which, like thee, no beginning knew;
Thou wast ere time began his race,
Ere glowed with stars the ethereal blue.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Unchangeable, all-perfect Lord,
Essential life's unbounded sea,
What lives and moves lives by thy word;
It lives, and moves, and is from thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Parent of good, thy bounteous hand
Incessant blessings down distils,
And all in air, or sea, or land
With plenteous food and gladness fills.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Greatness unspeakable is thine,
Thou sun, whose undiminished ray,
When short-lived worlds are lost, shall shine
When earth and heav'n are fled away.
